alert.note: Alert for Dickey (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 09 at 3:37PM CST until November 11 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches and additional ice accumulations as high as one quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Dickey County. * WHEN...Until Midnight CST Thursday Night. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
